charinfo.name: Jiraiya (S)
charinfo.description: Jiraiya (S) is one of the legendary Sannin that were trained by the third Hokage. Also known as the toad sage, he has been Uzumaki Naruto's teacher for the past few years. Original Design: Maothen

abilities.name: Katon Endan
abilities.description: Jiraiya (S) emits a jet of fire from his mouth dealing 20 damage to one enemy. This skill is replaced by Toad Oil Projectile after being used.

abilities.name: Toad Flat Shadow Control
abilities.description: Jiraiya (S) subdues one enemy and merges into their shadow, for 1 turn new enemy skills that target Jiraiya (S) will be reflected onto that enemy. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Wild Lion Mane
abilities.description: Jiraiya (S) will protect himself or an ally for 3 turns from enemy physical skills. If an enemy uses a physical melee skill on that character they will take 25 damage*. If an enemy uses a physical ranged skill their physical or melee skills will be stunned 1 turn and take 15 damage*. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Summoning Gamaken
abilities.description: This skill makes Jiraiya (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
